document_data.name: Ear Seekers
document_data.mainbody: The '''Ear Seekers''' were a tribe of [[orc]]s that lived in [[the North]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. They earned their name from the necklaces they wore, which were made out of the ears of [[elves]].
document_data.Relations: The Ear Seekers were at war with the [[wood elves]] of [[Ardeep Forest]].
document_data.History: After a battle between the Ear Seekers and the Ardeep elves, [[Gurrash]] was left with a mortal wound. The 20-some-strong war band ventured south to the settlement of [[Nightstone]] and tried to force their way beyond its walls.
document_data.Notable Members:
* Gurrash, war chief of the tribe
* [[Noraga One-Eye]], Gurrash's lieutenant
